parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index position within the current list of selected items, where Index ranges from 1 to ISelectionMgr::GetSelectedObjectCount2 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Mark
parameters.description: -1 = All selections regardless of marks 0 = only the selections without marks Any other value = Value that was used to mark and select an object

title: ISelectionMgr.GetSelectedCoordSysElement
description: Gets the selected coordinate system element.
signature:
System.Object GetSelectedCoordSysElement( 
   System.Int32
Index
,
   System.Int32
Mark
)

parameters.name: Index
parameters.description: Index position within the current list of selected items, where Index ranges from 1 to ISelectionMgr::GetSelectedObjectCount2 (see Remarks )

parameters.name: Mark
parameters.description: -1 = All selections regardless of marks 0 = only the selections without marks Any other value = Value that was used to mark and select an object

remarks:
After calling this method, call
ISelectionMgr::IsCoordSysElementSelected
.
